article:
It was Sunday. Martin and Steve were riding through the town on their bikes. Martin was riding in front. He was twelve years old. Steve was  _ . He was eleven. The two boys were going to river. They often went to the river _ they liked fishing. Then Martin saw a thief. He was coming out of a shop. He had an ugly  face.
He was _ two large bags to a car. The boys could see a fat man _ glasses. He was sitting in the car. Just then the ugly man dropped one of the bags and some things _ out of it. The ugly man picked up the thing s quickly, put them into the bags and got in the car. Martin and Steve rode quickly. They were going to ride to Martin's grandpa's house at once .t He could telephone the _ there.
